review_data.title: It’s was 10/10. I can say with confidence that I will visit this restaurant more than once!
review_data.content: Starting with a family and friendly atmosphere, a very cozy restaurant. Fast and high-quality service. I've eaten in Chinese restaurants in Zurich before, but I liked this place the most. It is also very convenient to take food to take away.
